athena: Project Athena is Winston's personal AI OS. It has 471+ sessions of persistent memory, uses a hybrid RAG architecture, and runs on Supabase + pgvector. It's the system you're talking to right now.
brew: Brew & Bean is a high-conversion F&B landing page with WhatsApp integration, optimized for lead capture. Built with Astro and achieves a 95+ Lighthouse score.
melvin: Melvin Lim's portfolio is a high-trust personal branding site for an SAF Officer. Uses narrative design with a bento grid layout. 100% accessibility score.
biotutor: ThatBioTutor is a full-stack digital marketing proposal for a Singapore tuition centre. Features SEO strategy, glassmorphism UI, and PDF export.
thatbiotutor: ThatBioTutor is a full-stack digital marketing proposal for a Singapore tuition centre. Features SEO strategy, glassmorphism UI, and PDF export.
